posts.title: INTERNSHIP POSTS
posts.heading: Employer Internship Portal
posts.description: Welcome to the Employer Dashboard where you can create and manage internship opportunities for talented GUC students.

features.createListings: Create detailed internship listings with custom titles and descriptions
features.specifySkills: Specify required skills, qualifications, and preferred majors
features.setTimeframes: Set clear timeframes, work settings (remote/hybrid/on-site), and compensation details
features.addCompanyInfo: Add company information and supervisor contacts

posts.connectionNote: Our platform connects you directly with pre-screened, motivated students whose skills and interests align with your organization's needs.
posts.searchPlaceholder: Search internships by job title, description, skills...
posts.createFirstMessage: Create your first post to get started
posts.noMatchingPosts: No posts found matching your criteria
posts.adjustSearchFilter: Try adjusting your search or filter

form.requirementsPlaceholder: Enter detailed job requirements, qualifications, and expectations
form.skillsPlaceholder: Type a skill and press Enter (e.g., JavaScript, React, UI/UX)
form.skillsHelpText: Skills will appear here as bubbles after you press Enter

browse.title: BROWSE INTERNSHIPS
browse.heading: Company Internship Explorer
browse.description: Browse internship opportunities posted by partner organizations across industries and locations.

benefits.identifyPartners: This explorer helps you identify potential internship partners and examine their past engagement with SCAD students.
benefits.discoverLeaders: Discover industry leaders and hidden gems that align with your students' career interests.

browse.note: Note: All displayed companies have been vetted by SCAD and maintain active partnerships with our institution.
browse.searchPlaceholder: Search internships by job title or company name ...

benefits.talentedStudents: Access to talented students with specialized skills
benefits.futureTalent: Potential to develop future full-time talent

browse.addListingNote: To add your own internship listing, use the "Post New Internship" option in your company dashboard.

applications.title: APPLICATIONS MANAGEMENT
applications.heading: Applicant Management Portal
applications.description: Monitor and evaluate all student applications to your posted internship opportunities in one centralized location.

features.viewApplications: View all applications organized by position and submission date
features.accessProfiles: Access comprehensive candidate profiles and application materials
features.reviewDocuments: Review attached documents (resumes, portfolios, cover letters)
features.exploreLinks: Explore professional social links and relevant student work
features.trackStatus: Track application status (new, reviewed, interviewed, selected, declined)

applications.standardizedNote: All application materials are presented in a standardized format for efficient comparison while preserving each student's unique presentation style.
applications.privacyNotice: Privacy Notice: Student information is protected and should only be used for evaluation purposes related to your internship opportunities.
applications.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or position...

interns.title: INTERN MANAGEMENT DASHBOARD
interns.heading: Intern Management Dashboard
interns.description: This comprehensive view displays all SCAD students who have interned with your organization across all programs and time periods.

categories.current: Current Interns: Students actively working in their positions
categories.completed: Completed Internships: Past interns awaiting evaluation
categories.evaluated: Evaluated Interns: Students with completed feedback assessments

features.filter: Filter students by department, position, time period, or evaluation status

interns.note: Note: Student information is protected and should be handled according to your confidentiality agreement with SCAD.
interns.searchPlaceholder: Search interns by name, department, position...

evaluations.title: EVALUATION PORTAL
evaluations.heading: Your Student Evaluation Portal
evaluations.description: Provide valuable feedback on interns who have completed positions at your organization. Your assessments help shape students' professional development and inform future placements.

features.assessTechnical: Assess technical skills relevant to the position
features.provideExamples: Provide specific examples of achievements and areas for growth
features.answerQuestions: Answer structured questions about performance and potential
features.addComments: Add private comments for school administrators (optional)

evaluations.confidentialityNote: Evaluations remain confidential between your company and authorized faculty and SCAD members.

common.noFiltersAvailable: No filters available at the moment
